name: Hatsune Miku: Roller Skating Music
storyline: Players will be controlling different vocaloids, such as Miku, Rin and Len, to skate on roads according to the music's rhythm.
summary: Hatsune Miku: Roller Skating Music is a licensed casual mobile music game where gamers can play single-player casual mode or compete iconic characters including Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kaito, Meiko and more.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: 399 Perfects in 1 Race: Hatsune Miku: Roller Skating Music
